It's a lot of fun. Allows customization."- dailyappshow.comUnleash the Fun!Get your Dog Pack ready to play the craziest game show around! Itâs time to sit up and cheer... âDog Pile!âDog Pile is packed with features:â Stunning yet adorable graphics in HD!â Interactive gameboards come to life as you play!â Collect dog bone biscuits and outfit your favorite Dog Pack!â Simple swipe controls get your Dog into the action!â Match your Dog on the Pile below before time runs out!â Use tilt controls to guide your Dogs through insane obstacles for big points!â Start by playing the thrilling Carnival courses before really unleashing your dogs in the zany Space Challenge!â Every level offers a fun and unique set of obstacles and gizmos to try!

reviews.title: So much fun!
reviews.comment: Really like this game. The stages are creative, the graphics are cute & it is fun to play. You can personalize your dogs or change them by collecting bones in each level. Creative game concept too! :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good, Simple, Addictive
reviews.comment: My two boys, four and six love it.  Its a good, simple and addictive game. Instant classic.
